item.title: Operation: Miles for Smiles
item.description: Operation: Miles for Smiles was a fundraising drive in which a group of bicyclists toured from California to Florida to raise funds for charity. They needed a website to promote their project and to allow donors and the public to track their progress across the country in real time. The web team consisted of Scott Madsen and me. He designed the website’s look-and-feel, while I turned his design into HTML and wrote the back end.

item.title: Tactical Thrift
item.description: An Express web app demonstrating a Thrift Savings Plan investment model based on Mebane Faber’s paper, A Quantitative Approach to Tactical Asset Allocation. Faber describes an investment system that is based on comparing the current price of a fund to the 10-month simple moving average (SMA) of that fund, and making a buy/sell decision based on that comparison. The app pulls fund data from the Thrift Savings Plan website and computes an investment position.
